full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GRUB MTHA'I RNAM BZHAG BLO GSAL SPROS PA BSKYED PA'I RGYAN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS S+O, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016A *, ,(CES GRUB MTHA'I RNAM BZHAG BLO GSAL SPO BSKYED PA'I RGYAN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DON NYER CAN DU MAS BSKUL BA NGOR, MDO SNGAGS RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BSOD NAMS GRAGS PA'I DPAL RNAM DPYOD MCHOG GI STEGS BGYIS PA 'DI KYANG THUB BSTAN YUN RING DU GNAS ZHING PHYOGS BCUR RGYAS PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS,, ,,)
